 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מָשַׁךְ‎</span> **verb** ==draw, drag== (Late Hebrew ***id.***; Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎מְשַׁח‎</span> (rare) ***be extended***, also ***conduct, take***, Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> is ***be dry, shrivelled*** (of fruit., etc.); Ethiopic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***bend*** (the bow); Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***grasp and hold*** I. [[BDB#Frey|Frey]]; IV. [[BDB#Frey|Frey]] [[BDB#Lane|Lane]]; compare also Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***mašku***</u></abbr>, ***skin*** (perhaps also ***march*** [[BDB#Dl|Dl]]<sup>HWB 431</sup>), Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***id.***, Aramaic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַשְׁכָּא‎</span> ***id.***); — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מ‎</span> [[1Kgs.22.34|1Kgs 22:34]] + 2 t., <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וּמָשַׁךְ‎</span> consecutive [[Job.24.22|Job 24:22]] 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מָֽשְׁכָה‎</span> [[Deut.21.3|Deut 21:3]], etc.; ***Imperfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִמְשׁוֺךְ‎</span> [[Job.21.33|Job 21:33]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיִּמְשֹׁךְ‎</span> [[Judg.20.37|Judg 20:37]] 2 masculine singular suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תִּמְשְׁכֵנִי‎</span> [[Ps.28.3|Ps 28:3]] 1 singular suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶמְשְׁכֵם‎</span> [[Hos.11.4|Hos 11:4]], etc.; ***Imperative*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְשֹׁךְ‎</span> [[Ps.36.11|Ps 36:11]], suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מָשְׁכֵנִי‎</span> [[Song.1.4|Song 1:4]] masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִשְׁכוּ‎</span> [[Exod.12.21|Exod 12:21]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מָשְׁכוּ‎</span> [[Ezek.32.20|Ezek 32:20]] ***Infinitive construct*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְשֹׁךְ‎</span> [[Exod.19.13|Exod 19:13]]; [[Josh.6.5|Josh 6:5]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לִמְשׁוֺךְ‎</span> [[Eccl.2.3|Eccl 2:3]] ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎משֵׁךְ‎</span> [[Amos.9.13|Amos 9:13]]; [[Ps.109.12|Ps 109:12]] plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎משְׁכִים‎</span> [[Judg.5.14|Judg 5:14]] construct <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎משְׁכֵי‎</span> [[Isa.5.18|Isa 5:18]]; [[Isa.66.19|Isa 66:19]] — 

**1.** ***draw*** and lift out of (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִן‎</span>), with accusative of person, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיִּמְשְׁכוּ וַיַּעֲלוּ אֶתיֿוֺסֵף מִן הַבּוֺר‎</span> [[Gen.37.28|Gen 37:28]] ([[BDB#E|E]]), so Jeremiah (+ <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בַּחֲבָלִים‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ב‎</span> instrumental) [[Jer.38.13|Jer 38:13]] compare <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תִּמְשֹׁךְ לִוְיָתָן בְּחַכָּה‎</span> [[Job.40.25|Job 40:25]] ***draw, drag along*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎משְׁכֵי עָוֺן בְּחַבְלֵי הֵשָּׁוְא‎</span> [[Isa.5.18|Isa 5:18]] (figurative); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּמָשְׁכוֺ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּרִשְׁתּוֺ‎</span> [[Ps.10.9|Ps 10:9]] (figurative of wicked catching and ***dragging*** the poor); ***draw, lead along*** (with hostile purpose) with accusative of person [[Judg.4.7|Judg 4:7]] (subject <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>; + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶלֿ‎</span> person and thing); ***lead*** or ***drag off*** (to doom, subject <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>) [[Ps.28.3|Ps 28:3]] (compare [[Ps.26.9|Ps 26:9]]); similarly, or = ***draw down*** to death, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מָשְׁכוּ אוֺתָהּ וגו‎</span> [[Ezek.32.20|Ezek 32:20]] (si vera lectio; reference to fall of Egypt), but read perhaps a form of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁכב‎</span> for <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎משׁכו‎</span>, [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] [[BDB#Co|Co]] [[BDB#Berthol|Berthol]], compare Sm.; absolute, subject heifer, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מָֽשְׁכָה בְּעוֺל‎</span> [[Deut.21.3|Deut 21:3]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ב‎</span> instrumental); ***draw, lead*** (in love), (figurative, subject <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>) <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּחַבְלֵי אָדָם אֶמְשְׁכֵם‎</span> [[Hos.11.4|Hos 11:4]], compare [[Jer.31.3|Jer 31:3]] (al. as **5** ==below==) 

**2.** ***draw*** the bow, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בַּקֶּשֶׁת‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מ‎</span> [[1Kgs.22.34|1Kgs 22:34]] = [[2Chr.18.33|2Chr 18:33]], but <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎משְׁכֵי ק‎</span> [[Isa.66.19|Isa 66:19]] (where text dubious, [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] <span class="bdbLangGreek">Μοσοχ καὶ εἰς</span>(<span class="bdbLangGreek">θΩβελ</span>), so [[BDB#Lo|Lo]] [[BDB#Sta|Sta]]<sup>Javan 8</sup> [[BDB#Du|Du]] [[BDB#Che|Che]]<sup>Hpt</sup>, — not [[BDB#Gr|Gr]] [[BDB#Che|Che]]<sup>Comm</sup> [[BDB#Di|Di]]). 

**3.** ***proceed, march*** (compare German ***ziehen***) <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וּמָשַׁכְתָָּ֫‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּהַר תָּבוֺר‎</span> [[Judg.4.6|Judg 4:6]] compare [[Judg.20.37|Judg 20:37]] (absolute), [[Job.21.33|Job 21:33]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אַחֲרָיו‎</span>); so also (perhaps) [[Exod.12.21|Exod 12:21]] ***proceed*** (i.e. forthwith), and take you a sheep; and probably <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎משְׁכִים בְּשֵׁבֶט‎</span> [[Judg.5.14|Judg 5:14]] ***those marching with the staff***, etc. (most under 

**2.** ***drawing with***, i.e. wielding). 

**4.** ***draw out*** a sound, ***give a sound***, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בִּמְשֹׁךְ הַיֹּבֵל‎</span> [[Exod.19.13|Exod 19:13]] ([[BDB#E|E]]) ***when the ram*** ('s horn) ***sounds***, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּקֶרֶן‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַיֹּבֵל בִּמ‎</span> [[Josh.6.5|Josh 6:5]] ([[BDB#J|J]][[BDB#E|E]]). 

**5.** ***draw out, prolong, continue***, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְשֹׁח חַסְדְּךָ לְֹידְעֶיךָ‎</span> [[Ps.36.10|Ps 36:10]] ***prolong, continue thy kindness to them that know thee***; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אַליְֿהִי לוֺ משֵׁךְ חֶסֶד‎</span> [[Ps.109.12|Ps 109:12]] (so possibly <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְשַׁכְתִּיךָ חָ֑סֶד‎</span> [[Jer.31.3|Jer 31:3]] ***I have prolonged kindness to thee***, compare Ryle [[Neh.9.30|Neh 9:30]] and elsewhere as **1** ==above==); compare <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֲלֶיהֶם שָׁנִים‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַתִּמ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רַבּוֺת‎</span> [[Neh.9.30|Neh 9:30]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חֶסֶד‎</span> omitted); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אַפְּךָ לְדֹר וָדֹר‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תִּמ‎</span> [[Neh.85.6|Neh 85:6]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַלְעוֺלָם תֶּאֱנַף בָּנוּ‎</span>); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אַבִּירִים בְּכֹחוֺ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וּמ‎</span> [[Job.24.22|Job 24:22]] i.e. ***he*** (God) ***prolongeth*** the life of ***the mighty*** ([[BDB#Du|Du]] ***draggeth*** them ***off***, as [[Ps.28.3|Ps 28:3]] **1** ==above==, — reading also <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֹבְּדִים‎</span> for <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אַבּ‎</span> with [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] [[BDB#Bi|Bi]]); compare 

**Niph\`al 6.** ***trail*** seed (draw along in sowing) [[Amos.9.13|Amos 9:13]] (opposed to <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎דָֹּרֵךְ עֲנָבִים‎</span>; compare <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מֶשֶׁךְ‎</span> below) 

**7.** (late) ***cheer*** (draw, attract, gratify) <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בַּיַּיִן‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶתבְּֿשָׂרִי‎</span> [[Eccl.2.3|Eccl 2:3]], — so [[BDB#De|De]] (who cites Late Hebrew, Chag<sup>14 a</sup>) [[BDB#Now|Now]] [[BDB#Wild|Wild]]. — <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מָשַׁךְ יָדוֺ אֶתלֹּֿצֲצִים‎</span> [[Hos.7.5|Hos 7:5]] is difficult, [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] [[BDB#AV|AV]] [[BDB#RV|RV]] ***he stretcheth out his hand with***, maketh common cause with, is hardly possibly, text probably corrupt [[BDB#We|We]] [[BDB#Now|Now]]. **Niph\`al** ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לֹא יִמָּשֵׁ֑כוּ‎</span> [[Isa.13.22|Isa 13:22]] ***they shall not be prolonged*** (days of Babylon); 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לֹא תִּמָּשֵׁךְ‎</span> [[Ezek.12.25|Ezek 12:25]]; [[Ezek.12.28|Ezek 12:28]] ***it shall not be postponed***. **Pu\`al** ***Participle long drawn out:*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְמֻשָּׁךְ‎</span> [[Isa.18.2|Isa 18:2]]; [[Isa.18.7|Isa 18:7]] of persons, = ***tall***; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תֹּחֶלֶת מְמֻשָּׁכָה‎</span> [[Prov.13.12|Prov 13:12]] ***hope postponed, deferred***.
